did.unittitle: Later Draft, Version A.7, fragment. Retype of p. 1-5 inclusive of manuscript originally sent to Mr. [Harold] Strauss. See Strauss letter to Arnow of March 28, 1968 and Arnow's letter to Strauss of 31 April [March 31?]. Original typescript [missing 3-5 page 2] with light editing and unedited photocopy of p. 2 (3-5) and unedited carbon of p. 1-5.
